initial_question.title: Add state for "scrolling to bottom"

satisfaction_conditions: A way to detect when automatic scrolling is in progress
Ability to prevent scroll interruption during automatic scrolling
State information accessible during component rendering

initial_question.title: Request for use-stick-to-bottom Support for React 19.0.0
initial_question.body:
Hi @samdenty,

Could you please update `use-stick-to-bottom` to support React 19.0.0? The current version 1.0.42 doesn't meet the peer dependency requirement for this React version.

Thanks!
